snippet: We have consulted marriage counselors and geriatricians to find out what caregivers -- either grown children or one of the spouses involved-- can do to help restore peace and balance to the relationship when a good marriage goes bad.
abstract: We have consulted marriage counselors and geriatricians to find out what caregivers -- either grown children or one of the spouses involved-- can do to help restore peace and balance to the relationship when a good marriage goes bad.

headline.main: In the Middle: Helping Unhappy Couples
